name: 4 Laser Drill
description: This module is a rotating four laser drill on an advanced turret with pitching for all lasers plus a rangefinder in the center. This base drill is used in EGOTech mining ships, without the material point scanner.
shortDescription: This module is a rotating four laser drill on an advanced turret with pitching for all lasers plus a rangefinder in the center. This base drill is used in EGOTech mining ships, without the material point scanner.
